title: 4 Struck in Port Norris Shooting
content:
NBC10.com
A woman and three men are recovering after a shooting in Port Norris, NJ.
Police say the victims were with a large crowd on the 1500 block of North Avenue shortly before 1 a.m. when a gunman opened fire.
One of the victims was flown to a hospital in Atlantic City while the other three victims drove themselves to hospitals in Vineland. All four victims suffered non-life threatening injuries.
No arrests have been made.
